content.question: Which of the following developments best explains the sentiment expressed in the first verse of the song lyrics?

choices.label: The conflicts between the federal army and Native Americans on western frontiers
The resumption of commerce with Great Britain after the American Revolution
The growth among people in the United States of a sense of national identity
The partisan clash between Democratic-Republicans and Federalists

content.answer: The growth among people in the United States of a sense of national identity

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
